title: Matchsafe, early 20th century
inscribed:
Spine inscribed, "New York. Hamburg. G.W.C. Co."
Back cover is diagonally inscribed "Made in Germany"
provenance: Collection of Carol B. Brener and Stephen W. Brener
creditline: Gift of Stephen W. Brener and Carol B. Brener
description: Rectangular form in design of a book.  Front cover is leaf pattern framing work, "Feu" in center. Back cover leaf pattern framing center diagonally inscribed, "Made in Germany."

tombstone.epitaph:
Matchsafe, early 20th century.
early 20th century. Vulcanite. Gift of Stephen W. Brener and Carol B. Brener. 1978-146-740.
